page.title: 04ANNUAL EVENTS AT CAERWYS
page.content:
{CARNIVAL.- Held in June on the playing fields preceded by a precession of floats,dancers,a band,scouts,guides etc. from the Piccadilly Inn. The carnival opens with the crowning of the queen followed by the judging of the floats and fancy dress.The entertainment then starts which includes Morris Dancers,Five A Side Football and a band. Around the field there are a variety of stalls and amusements with one large tent which houses all the competitions:- art,garden produce,cooking etc.
During the evening there is a barrel rolling race around the town square then a disco dance.
